text:
The summary says it all.  If I uncomment the line, Apache fails to come up.  
The o/s reports a 7024 event with a product-specific error 1.  This is 
repeatable at will.
creator: scratch65535@att.net
nick@webthing.com
text:
Please 
(1) Read the manual, which tells you what module implements that directive.
(2) Read the error log when something fails.
(3) Use a user support forum if you still can't figure it out AFTER the above.

This is none of the above.
